p: Conversely, pretreatment of RAP (100 and 200 mg/kg) significantly ( p < 0.05) reinstated the elevated levels by 53.12 and 74.45%, respectively. IL-1Î² levels by 29.24 and 59.50%, respectively, and IL-6 levels by 44.66 and 61.89%, respectively. These results suggest that RAP (100 and 200 mg/kg) ameliorates the upregulation of cytokines in a dose-dependent manner, and RAP exhibits potent anti-inflammatory properties. In addition, the plasma VEGF decreases with all doses by RAP (100 and 200 mg/kg), respectively ( Figure 5).
